<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/61658</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>61658</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Vectores en el espacio cartesiano</string>
            <string language="en">Vectors in the Cartesian space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektoren im kartesischen Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vecteurs dans l'espace cartésien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vetores no espaço cartesian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vettori nello spazio cartesiano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανύσματα στο καρτεσιανό διάστημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de vector en el espacio tridimensional. Se estudian propiedades y operaciones relacionadas con vectores, en particular, se estudian los productos escalar y vectorial.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of a vector in three-dimensional space, its properties and related operations, including the scalar and vector products.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">producto escalar</string>
            <string language="en">scalar product</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vector</string>
            <string language="en">vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">producto vectorial</string>
            <string language="en">vector product</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tridimensional</string>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept eines Vektors im dreidimensionalen Platz, in
seinen Eigenschaften und in in Verbindung stehenden Operationen, 
einschließlich die Scalar- und vektorprodukte zu erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept d'un vecteur dans l'espace 
tridimensionnel, ses propriétés et exécutions relatives, y compris 
les produits de grandeur scalaire et de vecteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito de um vetor no espaço tridimensional, nas suas 
propriedades e em operações relacionadas, including os produtos do 
scalar e do vetor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto di un vettore nello spazio tridimensionale, nelle
relative proprietà e nei funzionamenti relativi, compreso i prodotti 
di vettore e di scalare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια ενός διανύσματος στο τρισδιάστατο 
διάστημα, τις ιδιότητες και σχετικές διαδικασίες της, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένων των κλιμακωτών και διανυσματικών προϊόντων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skalarprodukt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vektorprodukt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dreidimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">produit scalaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">produit de vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tridimensionnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">produto escalar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">produto do vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tridimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prodotto scalare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prodotto di vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tridimensionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλιμακωτό προϊόν</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάνυσμα</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρισδιάστατος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
